backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing quiz management, teacher authorization, student attempts, and access control with CRUD ops for quizzes and results.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to concise descriptions summarizing each file’s purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining unified color palette and dark mode styles for the app.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the primary script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Central React component managing routing, view state, and student/teacher flows for quizzes.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and background styling for all app pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with attribution and themed styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with portal switching, Internet Identity auth controls, and app branding.
frontend/src/components/TeacherGate.tsx: Gate component that checks Internet Identity and teacher role, showing login, registration, or access-denied screens before rendering children.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating quizzes, including teacher quiz management and student quiz access.
frontend/src/hooks/useTeacherAuth.ts: Determines if the current user is a teacher, handles registration, and queries the user’s role via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining the app’s light/dark theme palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up QueryClient, and wraps the app in Internet Identity and query providers.
frontend/src/pages/student/ActiveQuizPic: Student page that lists published quizzes, handles loading/errors, and lets students select a quiz to begin.
frontend/src/pages/student/QuizTake.tsx: Displays a quiz for students to answer, manages navigation between questions, tracks selections, and submits answers after completion.
frontend/src/pages/student/StudentResult: Loads and displays a student's quiz attempt results, including score and a correctness breakdown per question.
Simple login form where students enter name and course before accessing quizzes.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/QuizEditor.ts: Form interface for teachers to create or edit quizzes with questions, options, and validation before saving.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/TeacherDashbo: Shows a teacher’s list of quizzes with options to create, edit, publish, and view results.
frontend/src/pages/teacher/TeacherResult: Allows teachers to select a quiz and view detailed student attempts and scores.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including feature list, architecture notes, and required images for a quiz app with teacher authentication and student quiz flow.
